entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
